004
005package edu.wpi.first.math.kinematics;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.MathSharedStore;
008import edu.wpi.first.math.MathUsageId;
009
010/**
011 * Helper class that converts a chassis velocity (dx and dtheta components) to left and right wheel
012 * velocities for a differential drive.
013 *
014 * <p>Inverse kinematics converts a desired chassis speed into left and right velocity components
015 * whereas forward kinematics converts left and right component velocities into a linear and angular
016 * chassis speed.
017 */
018public class DifferentialDriveKinematics {
019  public final double trackWidthMeters;
020
021  /**
022   * Constructs a differential drive kinematics object.
023   *
024   * @param trackWidthMeters The track width of the drivetrain. Theoretically, this is the distance
025   *     between the left wheels and right wheels. However, the empirical value may be larger than
026   *     the physical measured value due to scrubbing effects.
027   */
028  public DifferentialDriveKinematics(double trackWidthMeters) {
029    this.trackWidthMeters = trackWidthMeters;
030    MathSharedStore.reportUsage(MathUsageId.kKinematics_DifferentialDrive, 1);
031  }
032
033  /**
034   * Returns a chassis speed from left and right component velocities using forward kinematics.
035   *
036   * @param wheelSpeeds The left and right velocities.
037   * @return The chassis speed.
038   */
039  public ChassisSpeeds toChassisSpeeds(DifferentialDriveWheelSpeeds wheelSpeeds) {
040    return new ChassisSpeeds(
041        (wheelSpeeds.leftMetersPerSecond + wheelSpeeds.rightMetersPerSecond) / 2,
042        0,
043        (wheelSpeeds.rightMetersPerSecond - wheelSpeeds.leftMetersPerSecond) / trackWidthMeters);
044  }
045
046  /**
047   * Returns left and right component velocities from a chassis speed using inverse kinematics.
048   *
049   * @param chassisSpeeds The linear and angular (dx and dtheta) components that represent the
050   *     chassis' speed.
051   * @return The left and right velocities.
052   */
053  public DifferentialDriveWheelSpeeds toWheelSpeeds(ChassisSpeeds chassisSpeeds) {
054    return new DifferentialDriveWheelSpeeds(
055        chassisSpeeds.vxMetersPerSecond
056            - trackWidthMeters / 2 * chassisSpeeds.omegaRadiansPerSecond,
057        chassisSpeeds.vxMetersPerSecond
058            + trackWidthMeters / 2 * chassisSpeeds.omegaRadiansPerSecond);
059  }
060}
